name: Shorted Circuit Story
description:
Something is out to get you and you know it is close. Run around the rooms and interact with objects to learn more about your surroundings. Make sure whatever hurt you, never hurts you again.

Sincerely,

Willi

Controls:

- Use arrowkeys or AD to move around

- Use the spacebar to jump

- Interact with left mouseclick or E

Windows download only, srry :(

Submission for the Brackeys Game Jam 2022.1
